message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save a bit more. Would you be willing to consider a price of $90 for the product?
I understand you're looking to save some money, Bob, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $110, which is a great deal considering the product's value.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $100 for the product?
I understand you're really close to your budget, Bob, but I'm not willing to go below $105. I'm willing to make a small compromise, so I can offer it to you for $105, which is still a great deal.
I understand your compromise, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $102 for the product?
I'm willing to make another small compromise, Bob. I can offer it to you for $104, which is still a great deal considering the product's value.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still not comfortable going above $100. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I understand you're really close to your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one last compromise. I can offer it to you for $101, which is the closest I can get to your target price.
I appreciate your last compromise, but I'm still not comfortable going above $100. I think we've reached a good point, and I'm willing to accept your offer if you can meet me at $100.
